official_title: A bill to amend the Solar Energy and Energy Conservation Bank Act to authorize appropriations for the provision of financial assistance under such Act through fiscal year 1990, and for other purposes.
short_title: Solar Energy and Energy Conservation Bank Reauthorization Act of 1983

summary.text: Solar Energy and Energy Conservation Bank Reauthorization Act of 1983 - Amends the Solar Energy and Energy Conservation Bank Act to provide that the termination date for the Solar Energy and Energy Conservation Bank shall be October 1, 1990. (Current law provides that the Bank shall not exist after September 30, 1987.) Requires that final regulations ensuring financial assistance for FY 1984 and thereafter for the purchase and installation of solar energy systems of the active type be issued as soon as practicable after enactment of this Act. Authorizes appropriations for residential and commercial energy conserving improvements for FY 1985 through 1990. Authorizes appropriations for the purchase and installation of solar energy systems for FY 1984 through 1990.

titles.title: Solar Energy and Energy Conservation Bank Reauthorization Act of 1983

A bill to amend the Solar Energy and Energy Conservation Bank Act to authorize appropriations for the provision of financial assistance under such Act through fiscal year 1990, and for other purposes.
